attr.value: Elves — 2 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against covert companies)
Dunland; Hollin. Minion Elves may be brought into play at this site under EI. Slew the Great Warrior may be played at this site regardless of the requirement to have a faction in play.
Elves — 2 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against hero companies)
Dunland; Hollin. Tap an Elf at the site with a mind of 5 or more to make major items or gold ring items playable at the site this turn.
Traps* (Elvish Wards) — 2 strikes with 10 prowess (detainment if the company contains an Elf)

*A character with Thranduil's Halls as a home site may tap to cancel this automatic-attack. The first Elf creature played against a company at or moving to this site does not count against the hazard limit.
Traps* (Elven Wards) — 2 strikes with 10 prowess (detainment if the company contains an Elf)
* A character with Thranduil'sHalls as a home site may tap to cancel this automatic-attack.
Elves — 2 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment if the company contains an Elf)

Hidden site. Tap an Elf to reveal this site. If Huinen is at Ceber Fanuin you may tap this site to look at opponent's hand; Huinen may then tap and make a CP to place any number of hazards seen there on the top or bottom of opponent's play deck.
Elves — 3 strikes with 10 prowess (detainment if the company contains an Elf and Huinen is not at the site)
Hidden site. Tap an Elf in the company to reveal this site.
Port-on-Celduin. Any Elf or Man in a company that has moved here this turn from a site in Dorwinion or Northern Rhovanion may tap to play Old Winyards here (as if at a Border-hold [B]).

Only Elf and Maia hazard creatures with an asterisk (*) can be keyed to this site. Special items playable at Lórien are playable at this site. An Elf or Dúnadan may tap during the site phase to remove one corruption card, disease or dark enchantment from another character in his company. Both characters must make a CP afterwards.
Information, Items* (minor, major, gold ring) *—non-battle-gear items only—
(1st) Elves — 3 strikes with 9 prowess; (2nd) Elves — 2 strikes with 10 prowess

If Gandalf the White Rider or Lady of the Golden Wood is in play as a permanent-event, it must be used as anadditional automatic-attack (discard after use — ignore result of defeat). Any company moving to this sitehas its hazard limit increased by 1.
Undead. Awakened Plants — 2 strikes with 8 prowess; each character wounded must make a CP
Barrow-blade and Necklace of Girion are playable at the site (and also from the discard pile) if Vanish in Sunlight was played on an attack against the company the same turn.
Undead. Awakened Plants — 2 strikes with 8 prowess; each character wounded must make a CP
Non-unique hoard items are playable at this site.
Elves — 3 strikes with 9 prowess (cancelled if you have less than 6 P; detainment if you have less than 12 P)
Port. You cannot play any card that would make this site a Haven [H]. This site may not be used by overt companies. You receive the P if one of your companies is at this site.
Elves — 3 strikes with 9 prowess (cancelled if you have less than 6 P; detainment if you have less than 12 P)
Port. You cannot play any card that would make this site a Haven [H]. This sitemay not be used by overt companies or if you are Círdan. You receive the P if one of your companies is at this site.

Círdan the Shipwright specific. Port. This site is a protected Lordhaven [H]. If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are cancelled and you receive the P. Characters with Grey Havens as a home site may be brought into play at this site, regardless of the presence of any other character.

Elf-lord only. Elf-hold. If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are cancelled and you receive the P. This site is not considered a Haven [H] for the purpose of bringing characters into play. You may use this site as a rescue site instead of Thranduil's Halls; you must provide your opponent with a copy of this site when he wants to move here from Thranduil's Halls.

Lady Galadriel specific. Port-on-Anduin. This site is a protected Lordhaven [H]. If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are cancelled and you receive the P. Characters with Lórien as a home site may be brought into play at this site regardless of the presence of any other character.
Elves — 3 strikes with 10 prowess (cancelled if you have less than 6 P; detainment if you have less than 12 P)

Port-on-Anduin. You cannot play any card that would make this site a Haven [H]. This site may not be used by overt companies or if you are Galadriel. You receive the P if one of your companies is at this site.
Undead — 3 strikes with 9 prowess; cannot be cancelled by a skill card; each character wounded must make a CP
Non-Nazgûl creatures played at this siteattack normally, not as detainment. Any CP by characters at this site is modified by (an additional) -1.
Undead — 3 strikes with 9 prowess (cannot be cancelled by a card or ability requiring a skill); each character wounded must make a CP
Any CP made by characters at this site is modified by (an additional) -1.

(1st) Traps — 2 strikes with 11 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one Nameless Thing, Watcher in the Water or an Elf creature from his hand; keep the creature with the site (as a 2nd automatic-attack) until it is defeated or the site leaves active play.
Hidden Site. Discard a Stolen Knowledge from the company to reveal this site. When a gold ring is tested in a company at this site, the result of the roll is modified by +3. Contains a hoard.

(1st) Elves — each character faces a strike with 9 prowess (detainment against covert companies); (2nd) Animals (Elvish Hounds) — 4 strikes with 9 prowess (against overt companies only)
Port-on-Sea of Rhûn. Any company moving to thissite has its hazard limit increased by 2. A minion company may not attack another company at this site.A Ringwraith may not move to this site.

You cannot play any card that would make this site a Haven [H]. This site may not be used by overt companies or if you are Elrond. You receive the P if one of your companies is at this site.

Characters with Rivendell as a home site may be brought into play at this site, regardless of the presence of any other character.

You cannot play any card that would make this site a Haven [H]. This site may not be used by overt companies or if you are Elrond. You receive the P if one of your companies is at this site.

Trap — 1 strike with 10 prowess. One non-unique Elf creature may beplayed regardless of the site path and not counting against the hazard limit against a company at or moving to this site. Contains a hoard.

Thranduil of Mirkwood specific. This site is a protected Lordhaven [H]. If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are cancelled and you receive the P. Characters with Thranduil's Halls as a home site may be brought into play at this site regardless of the presence of any other character.
Elves — 3 strikes with 10 prowess (cancelled if you have less than 6 P; detainment if you have less than 12 P)
You cannot play any card that would make this site a Haven [H]. This site may not be used by overt companies or if you are Thranduil. You receive the P if one of your companies is at this site.
Maia — 2 strikes with 15 prowess (cannot be cancelled)
Only Awakend Plant and creatures with an asterisk (*) may be keyed to the site. Once tapped, this site cannot be untapped.
Only Awakend Plant and creatures with an asterisk (*) can be keyed to this site. Healing effects affect all characters at the site.
